channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Table Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Table Builder

item.title: CVE-2024-3282|2024-08-23T06:00:02.699Z -- unknown -- wp%20table%20builder
item.description: The WP Table Builder WordPress plugin through 1.5.0 does not sanitise and escape some of its Table data, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
